content:
My STU3 profiles are missing versions. They are generated from spreadsheets and I don't recall this ever coming up before.
see for example:

https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-deqm/qa.html#profile_indv_measurereport_deqm

the behavior before was for all the artifacts to be assigned the "fixed-business-version" from ig.json. Has this changed?
Right now, the version gets declared in the ig.ini file. It will soon move to the ImplementationGuide file
@Grahame Grieve Not understanding your comment. I was talking about how things currently work with the template?
was that what Eric was talking about?

I think we are getting confused with what the current or prexisting ig-pub behavior is what the future standard template behavior is going to be. So I am not using the standard template approach nor planning to for DEQM and US Core prior to imminent publishing and in the current approach the SD versions appeared in the Profiles based on ig.json "fixed-business-version". That is no longer the case for STU3 igs ( OK for R4 igs) . If this is no longer supported or not an easy fix, I will work around it. :-)
I think that you are saying that specifying fixed-business-version in the ig.json file no longer works for STU3 IGs? I can't see why that would be, it's not vaguely version dependent
OK resolved on its own. (not sure why I got that error)
(could have been inherited from profile that they were based upon?
